message.body: Pls call me when you get a chance. Thanks
Cindy is coming to treat on Thursday around midday. I know you said you would like to be there. Does midday work for you?
She said she was pretty flexible throughout the day. I actually had scheduled a bed bug dog to come tomorrow at 2 but Cindy told me to postpone that until later.
ï¿¼The floor looks great . There are some holes that might need to be filled in for the bugs, but I just mopped it and it looks great
This was a good decision, regardless of bugs. It's just much prettier
It looks so much better!! Are there any patches that need to be fixed or just little holes?
When you get chance can you take a couple pictures of what needs to be patched & a couple pics of the floor with out the rug?
I'm really psyched it came out well. I wish I had done that years ago.
Pls call me when you get a chance. Thanks
